response:
Based on the context provided, here are some water-resistant ladies' watches under $30:

1. Armitron Sport Women's Digital Chronograph Resin Strap Watch, 45/7034 ($12.98) - Water-resistant up to 100 meters (330 feet)
2. Casio LA20WH Series | Women's Digital Watch | Water Resistant | 100 SEC Chronograph | Alarm | LED Illuminator | 5-Year Battery ($16.88) - Water-resistant
3. Amazon Essentials Women's Digital Chronograph Resin Strap Watch ($16.10) - Water-resistant up to 165 Feet (50m)
4. Nine West Women's Gunmetal Bracelet Watch ($20.62) - Not water-resistant, but stylish and affordable option

Please note that while these watches are water-resistant, they may not be suitable for swimming or bathing. Always check the product details and customer reviews for more information on the watch's water-resistance and overall performance.
